synonym.mean: 单位，单元；装置；部队；部件

使成为一单位；使成一整体；单元化

bilingual.source: There is a picture of him in this unit.
bilingual.target: 在本单元中有他的照片。
在本单元中，让我们做好准备！

bilingual.source: There are two speaking tasks in each unit.
bilingual.target: 每个单元有两个口语任务。

bilingual.source: There is one pronunciation task in each unit.
bilingual.target: 每个单元都有一个发音任务。
每个单元包含三个两页的课程。

bilingual.source: In this unit, you will tell the time in English.
bilingual.target: 在本单元中，你将用英语报时。

bilingual.source: In this unit, you will introduce family members.
bilingual.target: 在本单元中，你将介绍家庭成员。

bilingual.source: In this unit, you will talk about school subjects.
bilingual.target: 在本单元中，你将讨论学校科目。

bilingual.source: In this unit, let's explore junior high school life.
bilingual.target: 在本单元中，让我们探索初中生活。

list.abstract: 《unit》是韩国Aurora Games公司旗下的一款真实FPS网络游戏。
unit是BBC科幻剧《神秘博士》中的一个虚构军事组织。

yingyinNormal.en: Unit cell contains two carbon atoms. Interior angle of a hexagon is 120 degrees.
yingyinNormal.zh: 单元晶格包涵了两个碳原子，六边形的内角为120°。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, that's right. I know who you are. Wade Owen Watts, born August 12, 2027. I also know where you are. Unit 56K, Columbus stacks. You were last seen entering your trailer three days ago. You haven't left since.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，我知道你是谁。韦德·欧文·沃茨，出生于2027年8月12日。我还知道你在哪儿。哥伦布市叠楼区，56K单元。你最后一次踏进破拖车屋门是在三天前。之后就再没出来过。

yingyinNormal.en: One' is their unit of measure, but it's not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 「一」是测量单位，但大家都错了。

yingyinNormal.en: Build the unit Cinderellie, lay the tile Cinderellie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辛德瑞拉（灰姑娘），去做柜子，辛德瑞拉，去铺瓷砖。

yingyinNormal.en: When I deliver. $500 per unit and you've got a deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我交货的时候每台给我500美元我们就成交了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a renegade unit. We don't know who they are yet. You're telling me there's an active IRA unit on the loose you know nothing about? Yes, I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是个叛逃的分支。虽然现在还不清楚成员到底是谁。你是说有一群活跃的IRA成员已经失去了控制，你们对具体情况一无所知？是的，是这样。

yingyinNormal.en: Using AGRA as her private assassination unit. Why did you betray us?
yingyinNormal.zh: 把阿格拉当作她自己的刺杀小队。你为什么背叛我们？

yingyinNormal.en: Zola. Bucky's whole unit was captured in '43, Zola experimented on him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是索拉，巴奇的部队43年被俘虏索拉，在他身上做实验。

yingyinNormal.en: Time gives legitimacy to its existence. Time is the only true unit of measure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 时间就是存在的证明，时间才是唯一的测量单位。

yingyinNormal.en: That Mobility unit's the truth. We're talking vehicular warfare. Best in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那支机动师不是盖的，他们的车轮战术世界一流。

yingyinNormal.en: It comes from people. Each unit is refined from approximately a hundred human beings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它来自人体。每提炼一个单位需要消耗一百个人类。

yingyinNormal.en: These lunatics plan to steal a cannon from the Union cavalry unit. Blast their way in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些疯子计划从北方军骑兵队手里偷走一门大炮，炸出一条路杀进去。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no possible way to answer that. A car length is not a standardized unit of measure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有可能能回答这个问题，"车身长"不是个标准化的度量单位。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you in? Just arriving at the secure unit. Explain. Door opening. Prison within a prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你进去了吗？刚刚到安保区。说。门已开。牢中牢。

yingyinNormal.en: Why not? We don't know. We had a unit nearby that heard the blast, went in to help. Russians turned them away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？我们不清楚。我们有个小队在附近，听到爆炸想进去帮忙，俄国人拒绝了。

yingyinNormal.en: So we don't want to look like we're shoving an armed unit of National Guards down Jim Matthews' throat, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不希望看起来像是把一支武装国民警卫队强加给了吉姆·马修斯，对吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But if humans are not the unit of measure, and the world isn't governed by mathematical laws, what governs all that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但假如人类没有那么独特，世界也不是靠数学法则来主宰，那什么才是？

yingyinNormal.en: That innovation is what made possible our modern consumer culture by enabling a low-unit cost for manufactured goods.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这项创新通过低成本的生产商品造就了现代消费文化。

yingyinNormal.en: Literally, we put a GPS unit on a pizza delivery man and recorded his typical Friday night in the heart of New York city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简单来说，我们在一个披萨送货员身上放了一个定位仪来记录下他在一个普通的周末夜晚。

yingyinNormal.en: When? Thirty-six minutes ago. Russian unit was on patrol. Two armored vehicles were destroyed. All eight troops were killed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么时候？36分钟之前。一队俄国士兵在巡逻，两辆装甲车被毁，8名士兵全部遇难。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 单位; 单元; 单元课
组件; 配件; 装置
班组; 小队; 部门

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a single thing or a separate part of something larger
sense_info_list.zh: 单位; 单元; 单元课

sense_info_list.en: a single apartment in a bigger building
a small machine that has a particular purpose or is part of a larger machine
sense_info_list.zh: 组件; 配件; 装置

sense_info_list.en: a group of people who work or live together, especially for a particular purpose
sense_info_list.zh: 班组; 小队; 部门

sense_info_list.en: a fixed quantity, etc. that is used as a standard measurement
a department, especially in a hospital, that provides a particular type of care or treatment

exam_freq_info.chinese: 部门; 系统; (尤指医院)科; 病区
(数量单位)小组; 部分; 单元
个人; 个体; 单独的事物; 装置; 元件

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 特别护理中心；监护室；重症监护室

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a department, especially in a hospital, that provides a particular type of care or treatment
sense_info_list.zh: 部门; 系统; (尤指医院)科; 病区

examination_example.sentence: It is arguable that the country should be regarded as the <highlight>unit</highlight> of authority.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国家应被视为权力单位，这是有争议的。

examination_example.sentence: The country, as the <highlight>unit</highlight> of authority, is often a convenient way of generalizing about a population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国家作为权力单位，通常是概括人口的一种方便的方法。

examination_example.sentence: Reading the earnings announcements of large retail stores like Macy's, Nordstrom, and Target is about as uplifting as a tour of an intensive care <highlight>unit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读梅西百货、诺德斯特龙和塔吉特等大型零售商店的业绩报告，就像参观重症监护科一样令人振奋。

sense_info_list.en: a fixed quantity, or others that is used as a standard measurement
sense_info_list.zh: (数量单位)小组; 部分; 单元

examination_example.sentence_trans: 你把这个光谱分成10个单位。

examination_example.sentence: On her income, with some changes, she would be able to buy an investment <highlight>unit</highlight> within two years, which she did.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在她的收入方面，如果做一些调整，她可以在两年内购买一个投资单元，她确实做到了。

examination_example.sentence: A few factors that could impact on variation would include the measurement of rain per <highlight>unit</highlight> of a crop planted, soil type, temperature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些可能影响变化的因素包括每种植作物单位降雨量的测量、土壤类型和温度。

sense_info_list.zh: 个人; 个体; 单独的事物; 装置; 元件

examination_example.sentence: They found that up to 421,000 <highlight>units</highlight> of bacteria can collect on the outside of a single shoe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，仅仅一只鞋的鞋面上就可以聚集多达42.1万个细菌单位。

examination_example.sentence: Steve Jobs announced Apple's "revolutionary mobile phone" — a device that combined the functionality of an iPod, phone and Internet communication into a single <highlight>unit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 史蒂夫•乔布斯发布了苹果公司的“革命性手机”，这款手机集iPod、手机和互联网通讯功能于一个个体。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people who work or live together, especially for a particular purpose

examination_example.sentence: The concern is pieces of "junk" that orbit the earth, with the potential to cause serious damage if they collide with operational <highlight>units</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们担心的是环绕地球运行的“垃圾”碎片，如果它们与运行单位相撞，有可能造成严重损害。

word_usage.usage:
unit表“单位”，既可指构成整体的“单位/单元”，也可指计量或计数用的“单位”，均为可数名词，引申可指“部门, 分队”。
示例：The basic unit of society is the family.
社会的基本单位是家庭。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 个人; 个体; 单独的事物; 装置
部门; 系统; (尤指医院)科; 病区
(数量单位)小组; 部分; 单元

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 个人; 个体; 单独的事物; 装置

examination_example.sentence: The company sold 600, 000 <highlight>units</highlight> the first year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司第一年售出了60万台。

sense_info_list.en: a department; especially in a hospital; that provides a particular type of care or treatment
sense_info_list.zh: 部门; 系统; (尤指医院)科; 病区

sense_info_list.en: a fixed quantity; or others that is used as a standard measurement
sense_info_list.zh: (数量单位)小组; 部分; 单元

word_usage.usage:
unit表“单位”，既可指构成整体的“单位/单元”，也可指计量或计数用的“单位”，均为可数名词，引申可指“部门, 分队”。
示例：The basic unit of society is the family.
社会的基本单位是家庭。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>unit</highlight> of measurement for the X-axis is days.
For more details, visit us at <highlight>Unit</highlight> 3 Park View Lane.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想了解更多详情，请到园景巷3单元参观。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 第2单元 让我们庆祝一下！

examination_example.sentence: It produced 20% more rice per <highlight>unit</highlight> than common ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每单位大米产量比普通大米多20%。
